title: Topic
content:
Overview

  • A summary or aggregation of sub-topics and arguments under it. This gives a birds-eye view of the topic.
  • A container or organizer of entries
  • The granularity of sub-topics and arguments has to be at uniform level.
  • A top-level topic should have high-level coverage and arguments should have high-level claims as well
  • Going down the tree should have increasing granularity.
  • The title should not be in a statement form unless it's a proper noun. 

Types of Topic

  • Category
  • Country
  • Person
  • Organization
  • Event
  • Generic topic
  • List of items or entries

Tags

  • Contains moral or ethical value
  • Public material (?)
